comments.author: dmstan
comments.body:
You can buy the "Bratislava Ticket". It's 18 Euros for the trip and you can take the train in a 3 day window. 

[https://www.oebb.at/en/regionale-angebote/ueberregionale-angebote/bratislava-ticket](https://www.oebb.at/en/regionale-angebote/ueberregionale-angebote/bratislava-ticket)

comments.author: oratory1990
comments.body:
>  Do I need to buy tickets online or can I buy them at the train station without any problems?  
  
Both are possible. There are ticket counters at every (larger) train station in Vienna.  
  
The go-to website is the website of the austrian federal train service (ÖBB):
https://shop.oebbtickets.at/de/ticket  
  
They also have a (very easy to use) app:  
https://www.oebb.at/de/tickets-kundenkarten/online-mobile-ticketing/oebb-app
